content: row 9 slip_stitch in each of first 3 sts chain 3 double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet in first chain-1 space chain 3 single_crochet in next chain-3 space chain 3 6 times 2 double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet in next chain-1 space turn = 7 chain-3 sps row 10 slip_stitch in each of first 3 sts chain 3 double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet in first chain-1 space chain 3 single_crochet in next chain-3 space chain 3 5 times 2 double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet in next chain-1 space turn = 6 chain-3 sps row 11 slip_stitch in each of first 3 sts chain 3 double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet in first chain-1 space chain 3 single_crochet in next chain-3 space chain 3 4 times 2 double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet in next chain-1 space turn = 5 chain-3 sps row 12 slip_stitch in each of first 3 sts chain 3 double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet in first chain-1 space chain 3 single_crochet in next chain-3 space chain 3 3 times 2 double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet in next chain-1 space turn = 4 chain-3 sps row 13 slip_stitch in each of first 3 sts chain 3 double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet in first chain-1 space chain 3 single_crochet in next chain-3 space chain 3 2 times 2 double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet in next chain-1 space turn = 3 chain-3 sps 3 pineapple scarf crochet © copyright 2008 my little citygirl http //mylittlecitygirl com/ row 14 slip_stitch in each of first 3 sts chain 3 double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet in first chain-1 space chain 3 single_crochet in next chain-3 space chain 3 2 double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet in next chain-1 space turn = 2 chain-3 sps row 15 slip_stitch in each of first 3 sts chain 3 double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet in first chain-1 space 2 double_crochet chain 1 2 double_crochet in next chain-1 space turn row 16 repeat row 2 note a diagram is available on p 4 repeat row 2-15 until desired length 6 more times = 7 repeats then finish with row 16 fasten_off weave in ends abbreviations sts - stitch es chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet skip skip foll - follow s space - space s repeat - repeat rs - right side ws - wrong side skill levels perfect for new knitters and crocheters using basic stitches minimal shaping projects using yarn with basic stitches repetitive stitch pat- terns simple color changes and simple sharping and finishing projects using a variety of tech- niques such as basic lace pat- terns or color patterns mid-level shaping and finishing projects with intricate
